title: Bitcoin's 'Taker Buy-Sell Ratio' Surges Signals Renewed Bullish Vigour
description: The taker buy-sell ratio measures the buy volume divided by the sell volume of takers in perpetual swap trades.

title: Canadian Police Unit Utilizes Chainalysis Blockchain Forensics for Cryptocurrency Investigations
description: Officials in law enforcement from Lethbridge, situated in the province of Alberta, Canada, have unveiled that the Lethbridge Police Service (LPS) is now utilizing Chainalysis blockchain forensics software. According to local reports, LPS has acquired the capacity to trace cryptocurrency transactions, enabling them to ascertain the locations where the funds have been deposited. Lethbridge Police […]

title: Crypto Analyst Expects Cardano (ADA) and DigiToads (TOADS) to ‘Experience an Explosive Surge During the Next Bull Market’
description: Renowned crypto influencer and Crypto Capital Venture founder, Dan Gambardello, has recently presented a compelling long-term projection for Cardano (ADA). Drawing insights from historical data and making comparisons with other digital assets, Gambardello envisions a substantial surge in ADA’s value, potentially reaching an unprecedented all-time high of $7.80 in the forthcoming bull market.
